#idea Thinking about custom tag icons for logseq

#warning under construction #warning

Inspired by Obsidian Alternate Checkboxes CSS snippet

Hereâ€™s what #idea looks like in the dev console:

<div
   class=""
   style="display: inline;"
   data-tooltipped=""

   ><a

#question how do my installed plugins change the structure?

I donâ€™t think I currently have any plugins that alter element attributes

Set up CSS Selector #bookmark to match

a.tag[data-ref="idea"]

Hide the displayed tag by making it tiny

a.tag[data-ref="idea"] {
	border: none;
	font-size: 0;
}

Append an icon with the font size we started at

a.tag[data-ref="idea"]:after {
	content: "ðŸ’¡";
	font-size: initial;
}

as-is, this has accessibility issues and font-size: initial wonâ€™t work with headings. Also, to do it right I should be encoding the icon
